dc_title_s: Census Blocks with Demographics, New York, 2000
dc_description_s: CUGIR, the Cornell University Geospatial Information Repository, using US Department of Commerce, Bureau of the Census data, developed the GIS data set versions of 2000 Census TIGER/Line files for 12 coverages for each of the 62 counties in New York State.  These files were developed to enable a user to see the geographic component from the 2000 Census. They can be used to join demographic data from the 2000 census for use in a geographic information system.
dc_creator_sm: U.S. Department of Commerce U.S. Census Bureau Geography Division
dc_publisher_sm: U.S. Department of Commerce U.S. Census Bureau Geography Division
